fullText: Letts has created a chilling allegory about the corrosive nature of American power and the lengths to which people will go to protect their version of the truth.
dtliExcerpt: Letts has created a chilling allegory about the corrosive nature of American power and the lengths to which people will go to protect their version of the truth.
